verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Wonderful! Counselor! Mighty God and Prince of Peace! You’re the bright Morning Star and Your wonders never cease! Counselor! When You speak – perfect wisdom, perfect peace How your word floods my soul, fills my thoughts and lights my heart.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Living Word, I have heard You. My heart soars, and so longs for more Truth in my spirit’s ear, teach my heart how to hear Drawing worship that You so deserve.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy One, Son of God! Full of grace and light and truth! Grace to live, light to see, truth that fully sets me free. Savior, Lord, Friend to me – undeserved! How can it be? Yet it’s true! Yes it’s true! And all glory goes to You!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where your Name dwells, in Your presence Joy and gladness fill the air There’s no other makes my heart soar Rightful worship – my response, Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Wonderful! Counselor! Mighty God and Prince of Peace! You’re the bright Morning Star and Your wonders never cease! Ages come, eons go, on and on Your beauty grows As your kingdom and peace, praise will evermore increase!{/lang-eng}
